    • findAll

      public List<T> findAll()

    • save

      public T save(T entity)

    • delete

      public void delete(T entity)

    • selectSingle

      protected Optional<T> selectSingle(String whereClause, Object... params)
      Executes a custom SELECT query and returns a single Optional result. Example: selectSingle("WHERE username = ?", username);

    • select

      protected List<T> select(String whereClause, Object... params)
      Executes a custom SELECT query and returns a list of results. Example: select("WHERE age > ?", 20);

    • update

      protected int update(String sqlClause, Object... params)
      Executes an update or other modifying query using raw SQL within a transaction. Example: update("SET email = ? WHERE id = ?", newEmail, id);

    • sql

      protected int sql(String rawSql, Object... params)
      Executes a raw SQL query within a transaction if it's a modifying query.

    • count

      public long count(String whereClause, Object... params)
      Convenience method to count rows in the table (optionally with a WHERE clause). Example: count("WHERE active = ?", true);

    • exists

      public boolean exists(K id)
      Checks if an entity exists by its ID.

    • executeInTransaction

      protected <R> R executeInTransaction(Broker.TransactionCallback<R> callback)
      Generic method to execute any operation within a transaction. All modifying operations automatically use this.

    • withTransaction

      protected <R> R withTransaction(Broker.TransactionCallback<R> callback)
      For backward compatibility - delegates to executeInTransaction
